topic_selection.strategy: choose topic_id first, then only sample slots compatible with that topic
topic_selection.intent_source: use topic.intent_hint OR infer from goal text

rules: do not put punctuation inside slot items; punctuation lives in templates
use opening_request templates for opening_request items; opening_greeting templates for greeting items
ensure there is exactly one space between tokens after rendering
no duplicate bullet lines within an answer
bullets should be imperative or checklist style

dup_control.near_dup: optional similarity check on normalized question (token Jaccard/cosine)
dup_control.target_dup_rate: <=20% across the dataset; reject/regenerate when exceeded
